attributes.action: encourage Europe to stop all manufactuers having to include instruction books in 20 or more languages with every item sold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it necessary to waste so much paper putting instructions inside every manufactured article in 20+ languages? Can not the instructions be in the home country's language but be available separately in the shops etc in other languages? I just bought a vacuum cleaner with 71 pages of instructions -only 3 in English!Total and utter waste!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
